name: Decamp
description:
Made for the Lost Relic game jam.

The aim of the game is to connect 3 nodes, while keeping something away from you. Turning off the lights makes something go further away from you, however increases your stress. If something starts to get too close to you, stress also starts increasing.

If you stress out, you lose.

credits:

EmptyRaider101 - node and TV texture
